title: Chain Lightning
description: A lighting bolt inflicting 40 points of damage to Health and half as much to Magicka then leaps to a new target. If the character has learned Augmented Shock 2/2 the lightning jumps on one additional target and does 60 damage. Caution! Friendly-fire is possible.

title: Fireball
description: A fireball which explodes on impact for 40 points of damage in a 15-foot radius. Targets on fire take extra damage. If the character has learned Augmented Flames 2/2 the radius of the fire explosion is increased by 5 and damage increases to 60 points. Does harm Followers but not Dragonborn.

title: Ice Storm
description: A freezing whirlwind that does 40 points of damage per second to Health and Stamina. The whirlwind radius is increased if the character has Augmented Frost 2/2. Spell range is smaller if cast with Destruction Dual Casting. Does harm Followers but not Dragonborn.

title: Flame Cloak
description: For 60 seconds opponents in melee range take 8 points of damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage. Does not harm Followers. Does harm neutral NPCs like town guards.

title: Frost Cloak
description: For 60 seconds opponents in melee range take 8 points of damage per second to Health and Stamina. Does not harm Followers. Does harm neutral NPCs like town guards.

title: Lightning Cloak
description: For 60 seconds nearby opponents take 8 points of damage per second to Health and half as much to Magicka. Does not harm Followers. Does harm neutral NPCs like town guards.

title: Whirlwind Cloak DR
description: For 60 seconds opponents in melee range have a chance of being flung away.

title: Close Wounds
description: Heals the caster 100 points.

title: Greater Ward
description: Increases armor rating by 80 points and negates up to 80 points of spell damage or effects.

title: Heal Other
description: Heals the target 75 points. Does not affect undead atronachs or machines.

title: Heal Undead DG
description: Heals the undead target 75 points but not the living atronachs or machines

title: Poison Rune DR
description: Targets that fail to resist take 3 points of poison damage per second for 30 seconds.

title: Repel Lesser Undead
description: All affected undead up to level 8 flee for 30s.

title: Stendarr's Aura DG
description: For 60 seconds undead in melee range take 10 points sun damage per second

title: Turn Undead
description: Undead up to level 13 flee for 30s.

title: Vampire's Bane DG
description: Sunlight explosion that does 40 points of damage in a 15-foot radius to undead

title: Banish Daedra
description: Weaker summoned daedra are sent back to Oblivion.

title: Bound Bow
description: Creates a magic bow for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

title: Conjure Ash Spawn DR
description: Summons an Ash Spawn for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing:.

title: Conjure Frost Atronach
description: Summons a Frost Atronach for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Conjure Mistman DG
description: Summons a Mistman from the Soul Cairn for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Conjure Seeker DR
description: Summons a Seeker for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Revenant
description: Reanimate a powerful dead body to fight for the player for 60 seconds.

title: Ash Shell DR
description: Targets that fail to resist are immobilized in hardened ash for 30 seconds.

title: Detect Life
description: Nearby living creatures (but not undead machines or daedra) can be seen through walls.

title: Ironflesh
description: Improves the caster's armor rating by 80 points for 60 seconds.

title: Telekinesis
description: Can pull an object to you from distance. Add it to your inventory or throw it.

title: Transmute
description: Transmute one piece of unrefined Iron Ore to Silver or Silver Ore to Gold if the caster is carrying any.

title: Waterbreathing
description: Can breathe under water for 60 seconds.

title: Firebolt
description: A bolt of fire that inflicts 25 points of fire damage. Targets on fire take extra damage.

title: Freeze DR
description: A spike of ice that does 20 points of frost damage to Health and Stamina and slows the target for 15 seconds.

title: Ice Spike
description: A spike of ice that inflicts 25 points of ice damage to Health and Stamina.

title: Ignite DR
description: A blast of flame that sets targets of fire doing 4 damage per second for 15 seconds.

title: Lightning Bolt
description: A bolt of lightning that inflicts 25 points of shock damage to Health and half as much to Magicka.

title: Fire Rune
description: Cast on a nearby surface it explodes for 50 points of damage when enemies come near. Affected targets take extra damage.

title: Frost Rune
description: Cast on a nearby surface it explodes for 50 points of damage to Health and Stamina when enemies come near. Movement speed is reduced for affected targets.

title: Lightning Rune
description: Cast on a nearby surface it explodes for 50 points of damage to Health and half as much to Magicka when enemies come near.

title: Fast Healing
description: Heals the caster 50 points.

title: Healing Hands
description: Heals the target 10 points per second but not undead atronachs or machines.

title: Necromantic Healing DG
description: Heals the undead target 10 points per second but not the living atronachs or machines

title: Steadfast Ward
description: Increases armor rating by 60 points and negates up to 60 points of spell damage or effects.

title: Sun Fire DG
description: Ball of sunlight that does 25 points of damage to undead

title: Turn Lesser Undead
description: Undead up to level 6 flee for 30s.

title: Bound Battleaxe
description: Creates a magic battle axe for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

title: Conjure Boneman DG
description: Summons a Boneman archer for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Conjure Flame Atronach
description: Summons a Flame Atronach for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Flaming Familiar
description: Summons a Flaming Familiar which will charge into battle and explode.

title: Reanimate Corpse
description: Reanimate a more powerful dead body to fight for the player for 60 seconds.

title: Soul Trap
description: If a target dies within 60 seconds fills a soul gem.

title: Spectral Arrow (Bound Bow)
description: Fires a Spectral Arrow at the target doing 30 points of damage and staggering the target (shot from Bound Bow but can be obtained alone with console commands).

title: Summon Arniel's Shade
description: Summons the Shade of Arniel Gane for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Summon Arvak DG
description: Summons the horse Arvak wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Magelight
description: Ball of light that lasts 60 seconds and sticks where it strikes.

title: Stoneflesh
description: Improves the caster's armor rating by 60 points for 60 seconds.

title: Icy Spear
description: A spear of ice that does 60 (90) points of frost damage to Health and Stamina.

title: Incinerate
description: A blast of fire that does 60 (90) points of fire damage. Targets on fire take extra damage.

title: Thunderbolt
description: A thunderbolt that does 60 (90) points of shock damage to Health and half that to Magicka.

title: Wall of Flames
description: Sprayed on the ground it creates a wall of fire that does 50 points of fire damage per second. Does not harm Followers or Dragonborn.

title: Wall of Frost
description: Sprayed on the ground it creates a wall of frost that does 50 points of frost damage per second. Does not harm Followers or Dragonborn.

title: Wall of Storms
description: Sprayed on the ground it creates a wall of lightning that does 50 points of shock damage per second. Does not harm Followers or Dragonborn.

title: Circle of Protection
description: Undead up to level 20 entering the circle will flee.

title: Grand Healing
description: Heals everyone close to the caster 200 points. Does not affect atronachs machines or undead.

title: Repel Undead
description: All affected undead up to level 16 flee for 30s.

title: Turn Greater Undead
description: Undead up to level 21 flee for 30s.

title: Conjure Ash Guardian DR
description: Creates an Ash Guardian that guards that location until destroyed. Consumes a heart stone from your inventory without which it will be hostile.

title: Command Daedra
description: Powerful summoned and raised creatures are put under the player's control.

title: Conjure Dremora Lord
description: Summons a Dremora Lord for 60 seconds.

title: Conjure Wrathman DG
description: Summons a Wrathman from the Soul Cairn for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Conjure Storm Atronach
description: Summons a Storm Atronach for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Dread Zombie
description: Reanimate a very powerful dead body to fight for the player for 60 seconds.

title: Expel Daedra
description: Powerful summoned daedra creatures are sent back to Oblivion.

title: Ash Rune DR
description: Cast on a nearby surface it explodes when enemies are nearby immobilizing them in hardened ash for 30 seconds.

title: Detect Dead
description: Nearby dead can be seen through walls.

title: Ebonyflesh
description: Improves the caster's armor rating by 100 points for 60 seconds.

title: Paralyze
description: Targets that fail to resist are paralyzed for 10 seconds.

title: Blizzard
description: Creates a blizzard that surrounds the caster. Targets take 20 point of frost damage every second for 10 seconds plus stamina damage.

title: Fire Storm
description: A 100-point fiery explosion centered on the caster. The closer a target is the more damage they take.

title: Lightning Storm
description: Fires a continuous stream of lightning. Target takes 75 points of shock damage per second to Health and half that to Magicka.

title: Bane of the Undead
description: Sets undead up to level 44 on fire and makes them flee for 30s.

title: Guardian Circle
description: Undead up to level 35 entering the circle will flee. Caster heals 20 health per second inside it.

title: Dead Thrall
description: Reanimate a dead body permanently to fight for the player.

title: Flame Thrall
description: Summons a Flame Atronach permanently.

title: Frost Thrall
description: Summons a Frost Atronach permanently.

title: Storm Thrall
description: Summons a Storm Atronach permanently.

title: Dragonhide
description: Caster ignores 80% of all physical damage for 30 seconds.

title: Mass Paralysis
description: All targets in the area that fail to resist are paralyzed for 15 seconds.

title: Flames
description: A gout of fire inflicting a base damage of 8 points of fire damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage. One of the two basic spells.

title: Frostbite
description: A blast of cold inflicting a base damage of 8 points of frost damage per second to Health and Stamina.

title: Sparks
description: Lightning which inflicts a base damage of 8 points of shock damage per second to Health and Magicka.

title: Arniel's Convection
description: Burns the target 1 point per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.

title: Vampiric Drain
description: Absorb 2 3 4 or 5 points (depends upon the level of vampirism) of health from the target.
magicka_cost: 6 10 13 or 17 per second (depends upon the level of vampirism)

title: Healing
description: Heals the caster 10 points per second. One of the two basic spells.

title: Lesser Ward
description: Increases armor rating by 40 points and negates up to 40 points of spell damage or effects.

title: Bound Dagger DR
description: Creates a magic dagger for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

title: Bound Sword
description: Creates a magic sword for 120 seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.

title: Conjure Familiar
description: Summons a Familiar for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

title: Raise Zombie
description: Reanimate a weak dead body to fight for the player for 60 seconds.

title: Summon Unbound Dremora
description: Summons an unbound Dremora.

title: Candlelight
description: Creates a hovering light that lasts for 60 seconds.

title: Equilibrium
description: Convert health into magicka at a rate of 25 points per second. Caster can be killed by this effect.

title: Oakflesh
description: Improves the caster's armor rating by 40 points for 60 seconds.
